mapper.select: SELECT id, gmt_create AS gmtCreate, gmt_modify AS gmtModify, name, state, number_of_courses AS numberOfCourses, provider_id AS providerId, provider_code AS providerCode, phone from b_school_institution_location WHERE id = #{id};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO b_school_institution_location( gmt_create, gmt_modify, name, state, number_of_courses, provider_id, provider_code, phone ) VALUES ( NOW(), NOW(), #{name}, #{state}, #{numberOfCourses}, #{providerId}, #{providerCode}, #{phone} )
